mapper.update: update event_sorce set EVT_SRC_CODE = #{evtSrcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_SRC_NAME = #{evtSrcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_SRC_DESC = #{evtSrcDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVT_SRC_ID = #{evtSrcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVT_SRC_ID, EVT_SRC_CODE, EVT_SRC_NAME, EVT_SRC_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REGION_ID, REMARK from event_sorce where EVT_SRC_ID = #{evtSrcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select EVT_SRC_ID, EVT_SRC_CODE, EVT_SRC_NAME, EVT_SRC_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REGION_ID, REMARK from event_sorce
